detail_desc: Knee-length skirt in a spot-print crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist. Jersey underskirt.

Trousers in sturdy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Cap in cotton twill with a small embroidered detail and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Lightweight outdoor gilet with padded sections front and back and reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and a small zipped pocket at the back. Partly lined in fleece.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and a yoke with gathers at the back and on the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.

Patterned swimsuit in UV-protective material with a stand-up collar, short sleeves, short legs and a zip down the front with a chin guard. UPF 50.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length, A-line dress in sturdy, zebra-striped piqué made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with a ribbed collar in a contrasting colour and button placket. Round, cut-out sections and visible buttons at the back, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and a single button fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Skirt in stretch jersey made from a viscose blend containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist.
Wide jumper in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, long dolman sleeves and a straight hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with inset sections in ribbed and glossy fabric. Waist panel containing a concealed key pocket, and ventilating mesh down the legs. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
